markups.originaltext: By default, instances of user-defined classes are consideredtruthy, unless either __bool__ or __len__ is implemented.

textblocks.text:
By default, instances of user-defined classes are considered
truthy, unless either __bool__ or __len__ is implemented.

markups.originaltext: By implementing special methods, your objects can behave likethe built-in types, enabling the expressive coding style thecommunity considers Pythonic.

textblocks.text:
By implementing special methods, your objects can behave like
the built-in types, enabling the expressive coding style the
community considers Pythonic.

markups.originaltext: What the Python documentation calls the “Python Data Model,” most authors would say is the“Python object model.”

textblocks.text:
What the Python documentation calls the “Python Data Model,” most authors would say is the
“Python object model.”
